dataset.title: Validation of the Name Adiantum meishanianum (Pteridaceae), a Species Endemic to Taiwan

creator.organizationName: Department of Biology Science, National Sun Yat-sen University

address.deliveryPoint: Department of Biology Science, National Sun Yat-sen University, Kaohsiung 804, Taiwan

creator.organizationName: Division of Forest Biology, Taiwan Forestry Research Institute
Division of Forest Biology, Taiwan Forestry Research Institute

abstract.para: While investigating the fern called Adiantum meishanianum F. S. Hsu ex Y. C. Liu & W. L. Chiou (Pteridaceae), it was discovered that the name was not validly published because it had not appeared in an effectively published work. The name is validated herein; the holotype is deposited in HAST, and there are paratypes in TAIF, HAST, and SYSU.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Meishan Village, Meishankou, Kaohsiung County, Taiwan,

section.title: Diagnosis
section.para: The present paper validates the name Adiantum meishanianum and designates a type specimen. As noted, the diagnosis provided by Hsu (1993) was never effectively published and is brief and in some parts erroneous. Therefore, we re-describe and present a full diagnosis and description of A. meishanianum herein.
